table_1: {"Bioclimatic variable":{"0":"bio1","1":"bio2","2":"bio3","3":"bio4","4":"bio5","5":"bio6","6":"bio7","7":"bio8","8":"bio9","9":"bio10","10":"bio11","11":"bio12","12":"bio13","13":"bio14","14":"bio15","15":"bio16","16":"bio17","17":"bio18","18":"bio19"},"description":{"0":"Annual mean temperature (degrees)","1":"Mean diurnal range (mean of monthly (max temp - min temp))","2":"Isothermality (BIO2\/BIO7 x 100)","3":"Temperature seasonality (standard deviation x 100)","4":"Max temperature of warmest month (degrees)","5":"Min temperature of coldest month (degrees)","6":"Temperature annual range (BIO5-BIO6; degrees)","7":"Mean temperature of wettest quarter (degrees)","8":"Mean temperature of driest quarter (degrees)","9":"Mean temperature of warmest quarter (degrees)","10":"Mean temperature of coldest quarter (degrees)","11":"Annual precipitation (mm.year-1)","12":"Precipitation of wettest month (mm)","13":"Precipitation of driest month (mm)","14":"Precipitation seasonality (coefficient of variation)","15":"Precipitation of wettest quarter (mm.3months-1)","16":"Precipitation of driest quarter (mm.3months-1)","17":"Precipitation of warmest quarter (mm.3months-1)","18":"Precipitation of coldest quarter (mm.3months-1)"}}
